lmm.controller.user

Class FavoriteFilmController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lmm.controller.MainController
      • lmm.controller.user.FavoriteFilmController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFavoriteFilmController, IMainController

    public class FavoriteFilmController
extends MainController
implements IFavoriteFilmController
    This class manage the favorite films of an user.
    Author:
    Roberto Reibaldi, Luca Pascucci
